basics.name: Eric manosalva
basics.label: Frontend Developer con 8 años creando experiencias web escalables y de alto rendimiento.
basics.summary: Frontend Developer with more than 7 years of experience specialized in creating fast and engaging web solutions. With a strong background in React, Vue, Git, Github, Unit Testing and E2E Testing to ensure code quality. Self-taught, combined with a passion for web development, drives me to deliver custom and high quality solutions. Committed to excellence and continuous learning to contribute to the success of each project

work.name: Allan Solutions
work.summary: In my current role at Allan Solutions as a Senior Frontend Developer, I have significantly contributed to the creation of innovative web solutions. I specialize in cutting-edge technologies with a particular focus on Data Analysis and Reporting Systems for the Electric Vehicles and Digital Marketing industries. This experience has significantly expanded and strengthened my technical skills and data analysis capabilities.

work.name: Omni PRO
work.summary: During my time at Omni.PRO as a Mid Frontend Developer, I had the opportunity to work with leading-edge technologies such as Angular 14 and Vue 3. I highlighted my collaboration in OMS where I contributed to the development of a web platform for service management and a mobile application for load control. This experience allowed me to strengthen my skills in cutting-edge technologies and innovative problem-solving within multidisciplinary teams.

work.name: Celerik
work.summary: As a Mid Frontend Developer, I contributed to several projects using React.js. In TeamClass, I led the creation of an online course purchasing platform. In Prospective, I collaborated on the development of a platform to manage public transport. In Mantial, I participated in the design of an NFT marketplace. In Creators Legal, I contributed to a platform for digital contracts. These experiences allowed me to expand my skills as a Frontend Developer and work with cutting-edge technologies.

work.name: Citixen
work.summary: At Citixen, I served as a team leader and Frontend Developer where I worked with React.js on various web projects. In the Citixen Administration, I collaborated on a platform to manage urban courier companies. Additionally, I participated in the development of a web application to order and track urban courier services for the Citixen Client. These experiences allowed me to expand my leadership and front-end development skills using innovative technologies.

work.name: FZ Academia
work.summary: At FZ Academia, I worked as a Frontend Developer specializing in React.js for various platforms. I collaborated on the creation of a musical e-learning platform in FZ Academia Admin and developed an informational website about the courses. These experiences strengthened my front-end development skills and allowed me to work with diverse technologies on educational and informational projects.

education.area: Information systems analysis and development technician
